response.overview: A staged performance of a Twitter fanfiction which depicts an alternate version of the Simpson family and Springfield, where most of its inhabitants are weed-loving stoners. There is a second Simpson son named Ken. Bart is sent to Iraq to fight a war. The bonds within the family, and Springfield in general, are getting torn apart by addiction.
response.tagline: What if Homer Simpson smoked weed
response.title: Marijuana Simpson: a Staged Reading
